sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.IsQBSOverpopulated</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>true</client_callable>
        <description>Returns error message if QBS contains too many elements</description>
        <name>IsQBSOverpopulated</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var IsQBSOverpopulated = Class.create();
IsQBSOverpopulated.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
    type: 'IsQBSOverpopulated',
	
	getErrorMessage: function() {
		var qbsSysId = this.getParameter('qbs_sys_id');
	    var qbsm = new SNC.QueryBasedServiceManager();
		var err = qbsm.getErrorMessageIfTooManyElements(qbsSysId);
		//create a tooltip text by removing all the HTML tags
		var regex = /<.+?>/g;
		var tooltip = err.replace(regex, '');
		if (0 !== err.length)
			err = {message: err, tooltip: tooltip};
		return JSON.stringify(err);
	}
});]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2016-01-20 15:41:37</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>31a3f4c2f3011200c3fcae4716612b09</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>9</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>IsQBSOverpopulated</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Application Service" source="com.snc.cmdb.it_service">72b4cdcf6da620100acb70b353433039</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_31a3f4c2f3011200c3fcae4716612b09</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2020-01-23 11:30:38</sys_updated_on>
        <u_script_length>569</u_script_length>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
